annotations.description: Cluster is not converging: nodes report different number of peers in the cluster. Job is {{ $labels.job }}

rules.expr: stddev by (cluster, namespace, job, cluster_name) (sum without (state) (cluster_node_peers)) != 0

annotations.description: Nodes report different number of peers vs. the count of observed Alloy metrics. Some Alloy metrics may be missing or the cluster is in a split brain state. Job is {{ $labels.job }}
annotations.summary: Nodes report different number of peers vs. the count of observed Alloy metrics.

rules.expr:
sum without (state) (cluster_node_peers) !=
on (cluster, namespace, job, cluster_name) group_left
count by (cluster, namespace, job, cluster_name) (cluster_node_info)
